summary: WHEN YOU START YOUR CAR.  A MESSAGE COMES ON THAT DOORS ARE NOT CLOSED.  IT HAPPENS RANDOMLY EVERY TIME YOU DRIVE THE CAR.  YOU CAN OPEN AND SHUT YOUR DOORS.  ALL THE TIME.  THE CAR ALSO RANDOMLY HONKS THE HORN AND THE LIGHTS ALL FLASH.  WE HAVE CHANGED THE BATTERIES IN THE REMOTES AND IT STILL HAPPENS.  THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR WHILE.
